name: Billy & Betty
description:
Fifth place at Fifty-Fifty game jam in 2019 with a theme of long hair.

Controls: 

Start game - Enter 

Billy Controls:
Movement - WASD
Grab Betty's hair - Space 

Betty Controls:
Movement - Arrows
Throw hair - Enter 

Restart position to checkpoint if stuck - ESC

Team:

Dela Morcian - art
Piotr Samborowski - game design
Bartłomiej Stanasiuk - programming
